Requirement: The software should provide customizable alerts and notifications for important events or thresholds
The system should ensure that all software and hardware components used in the network are up-to-date and secure
The system should be able to analyze data in real-time to identify any trends or patterns
The system shall provide proactive notifications to users in case of planned maintenance or downtime
When purchasing a streaming movie or pre-paid card via credit card  the processing time should have a maximum response time of 15 seconds.
The software system shall have version control and rollback capabilities to revert to a stable state in case of software failures
The software should provide comprehensive APIs and SDKs for seamless integration with third-party applications
The software architecture should be designed to support distributed processing and parallel computing for scalable analysis of IoT data
The software should have multi-user support with role-based access control to ensure data privacy and security
The system should be easy enough to maintain that someone else could do it with a manual and a few hours of training
The actuators should have a compact and unobtrusive design to minimize their visual impact
The system shall be compatible with IIS6.0 and above or  Apache 2.0 and above.
The software shall support machine learning algorithms for predictive analysis of sensor data
The system shall provide a machine learning module for anomaly detection and predictive maintenance based on sensor data
The system shall provide an automated software update mechanism with rollback capabilities in case of issues during updates
The IoT software should be platform-independent and compatible with major operating systems such as Windows  Linux  and macOS
The software solution should support modular and extensible components to facilitate scalability and ease of system integration
The software should offer data visualization and reporting capabilities for users to understand and act upon the collected data
The software system needs a robust security mechanism in place so that unauthorized users are not allowed access to parts of the system.
The software architecture should be designed to support distributed computing for scalable and parallel processing of IoT data
The software should provide flexible APIs and SDKs for developers to integrate with different IoT platforms and services
The system shall meet software quality and safety standards to minimize the risk of errors or malfunctions
The software should support real-time analytics and machine learning algorithms for proactive decision-making
